TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit XamlDuplicateMemberException extends System.Xaml.XamlException

summary.span: XAML 寫入器會嘗試將值寫入至相同的 [物件] 節點重複的成員時擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when a XAML writer attempts to write a value for a duplicate member into the same object node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您處理這個例外狀況從 XAML 節點資料流時，成員可能會報告為重複數種可能的情況。If you handle this exception from a XAML node stream, members might be reported as duplicates in several possible situations. 比方說，XAML 內容屬性的明確屬性項目可能會加上空白字元會解譯為內容，如果集合是泛空白字元顯著。For example, an explicit property element for a XAML content property might be preceded by white space that is interpreted as content, if the collection is white-space significant. 或 XAML 寫入器可能會嘗試重設的屬性，應改用`GetObject`預設值。Or the XAML writer might be attempting to reset a property that should instead be using a `GetObject` default value. 如果您要分析 XAML 節點資料流中的個別節點，您通常可以判斷問題的來源。If you analyze individual nodes in the XAML node stream, you can often determine the source of the problem. 如果 XAML 物件寫入器會提供特殊處理重複的成員，它就可以避免一些重複的成員例外狀況，如果您指定作為`true`中該初始化。If a XAML object writer provides special handing for duplicate members, it can prevent some duplicate member exceptions if you specify as `true` in that initialize the .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Public Sub New (message As String, innerException As Exception)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: message

span.span: The message that describes the exception.

param.span: 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。

span.span: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.

param.name: innerException
param.span: 做為目前例外狀況發生原因的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.

param.span: 如果 參數不是 ，則目前的例外狀況會在處理內部例外的 區塊中引發。

span.span: If the parameter is not , the current exception is raised in a block that handles the inner exception.

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息以及造成此例外狀況的內部例外狀況的參考，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
